BILL.TITLE: Infrastructure for spatial information in the Community (INSPIRE)

DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the report by Mrs Brepoels, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the proposal for a directive of the European Parliament and of the Council establishing an infrastructure for spatial information in the Community (INSPIRE) (COM(2004)0516 – C6-0099/2004 – 2004/0175(COD)) ( A6-0108/2005 ).
